WorkItem.Description: Hi, I found endless small CPU load (0.2 - 4%) in idle state of ModernUI apps. Profiler reporting the ProgressBar moving always (IsIntermidiate == true/false too). The process can be stopped by ProgressBar elements set Collapsed state.
WorkItem.Summary: Small CPU load in idle process

Comments.Message: Resolved with changeset 110094: Addressing CPU usage on idle state by disabling ProgressBar.IsIndeterminate in default ModernFrame style.
